person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Moslem fundamentalists killed 19 civilians overnight in Blida province south of Algiers , Algerian security forces said on Friday .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| Moslem fundamentalists |
| Algerian security forces |

Note: I'm assuming that "Moslem fundamentalists" is referring to a group of people and not a single person. Similarly, "Algerian security forces" is also a group of people.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| Moslem fundamentalists |
| Algerian security forces |

Note: Both "Moslem fundamentalists" and "Algerian security forces" are groups of people, and therefore, they are the valid entities that can be classified as "Person".
